University of Portsmouth: The University of Portsmouth is a public university in Portsmouth, England.[7] Comprising five faculties, the university offers a wide range of academic disciplines.[8]  With around 28,280 students enrolled in undergraduate and postgraduate programs, the university in 2022 was the 25th-largest higher education institution by student enrolments in the United Kingdom.[9] The university employed approximately 3,500 staff in 2020.[10]
